https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5eStv6ruzqRY1B7iYuYJbPIjyZk.jpg A documentary crew follows the exploits of an up and coming indie filmmaker as he attempts to win an Oscar with his second feature film, leading to all sorts of wacky hi-jinks with his oddball cast and crew. Beast with a Budget
